name: Listener
desc: A widget that calls callbacks in response to common pointer events.

fields.name: onPointerDown
fields.desc: Called when a pointer comes into contact with the screen (for touch pointers), or has its button pressed (for mouse pointers) at this widget's location.

fields.name: onPointerMove
fields.desc: Called when a pointer that triggered an [onPointerDown] changes position.

fields.name: onPointerUp
fields.desc: Called when a pointer that triggered an [onPointerDown] is no longer in contact with the screen.

fields.name: onPointerHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer that has not triggered an [onPointerDown] changes position.

fields.name: onPointerCancel
fields.desc: Called when the input from a pointer that triggered an [onPointerDown] is no longer directed towards this receiver.

fields.name: onPointerPanZoomStart
fields.desc: Called when a pan/zoom begins such as from a trackpad gesture.

fields.name: onPointerPanZoomUpdate
fields.desc: Called when a pan/zoom is updated.

fields.name: onPointerSignal
fields.desc: Called when a pointer signal occurs over this object.

fields.name: behavior
fields.desc: How to behave during hit testing.
